entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
